sentences.en: All colour fades— especially under the impact of direct sunlight.
sentences.cn: 所有颜色都会褪色——尤其是在阳光直射下。

sentences.en: Credit counseling helped us get out from under.
sentences.cn: 信用咨询使我们免除了忧虑

sentences.en: George struggled wildly, going under and resurfacing at regular intervals.
sentences.cn: 乔治疯狂地挣扎，不断在水面上浮浮沉沉。

sentences.en: He took a deep breath before he went under.
sentences.cn: 他在钻下水前深深地吸了口气。

sentences.en: He was wearing a jacket under his coat.
sentences.cn: 他在大衣里面穿了件夹克。

sentences.en: His best friend was killed by police under extremely questionable circumstances.
sentences.cn: 他最好的朋友在极其可疑的情况下被警察打死了。

sentences.en: I could see something glittering under the water.
sentences.cn: 我看到水下有东西在闪闪发光。

sentences.en: I fell under the influence of a history master.
sentences.cn: 我当时深受一位历史老师的影响。

sentences.en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentences.cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentences.en: I spend just under four hours a day seeing customers.
sentences.cn: 我一天接待客户所花的时间将近四小时。

sentences.en: I’d scare my mom by diving in and staying under (= staying under the water ) for as long as I could.
sentences.cn: 我会跳进水里，在水下待到憋不住为止，以此来吓唬我妈妈。

sentences.en: In summer, we often slept under the stars.
sentences.cn: 夏天，我们经常露宿星空之下。

sentences.en: Lie face upwards with a cushion under your head.
sentences.cn: 头枕垫子仰卧。

sentences.en: Most of the events listed cost under £60.
sentences.cn: 所列活动项目的花费大多低于 60 英镑。

sentences.en: Place the omelette under a gentle grill until the top is set.
sentences.cn: 将煎蛋饼放在烤架下用文火烘烤，直到表面凝固。

sentences.en: Several proposals are under consideration by the state assembly.
sentences.cn: 有几个提案州议会正在讨论中。

sentences.en: The bench collapsed under the weight of(= unable to support the weight of ) so many people.
sentences.cn: 长椅承受不住这么多人的重量塌了。

sentences.en: The operation is carried out under a general anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 该手术是在全身麻醉情况下实施的。

sentences.en: The radio said other parts of the capital also came under shellfire.
sentences.cn: 广播上说首都的其他地区也遭到了炮火袭击。

sentences.en: The sand on the floor scrunched under our feet.
sentences.cn: 地板上的沙子在我们脚下嘎吱作响。

sentences.en: There is a wide veranda under the overhang of the roof.
sentences.cn: 悬吊的屋顶下是一条宽阔的游廊。

sentences.en: These toys are not suitable for children under five.
sentences.cn: 这些玩具不适合五岁以下的儿童玩。

sentences.en: They found a labyrinth of tunnels under the ground.
sentences.cn: 他们发现了一处迷宫似的地道。

sentences.en: Under her arm, she carried a large portfolio.
sentences.cn: 她腋下夹了个大公文包。

sentences.en: Under these laws, he said, Mr. Rice's assets could have been frozen.
sentences.cn: 他说根据这些法规，赖斯先生的资产可能已经被冻结了。

sentences.en: We sailed under the Golden Gate Bridge.
sentences.cn: 我们在金门大桥下航行。

sentences.en: We were forbidden, under pain of imprisonment, to use our native language.
sentences.cn: 我们被禁止使用母语，违者将被关进监狱。

sentences.en: Wendy had hidden the box under her bed.
sentences.cn: 温迪把盒子藏在了自己的床底下。

sentences.en: Write your name under your picture.
sentences.cn: 在你的照片下面写上名字。

words.tran_cn: 后进生；学校学习成绩低于智商的学生
出价低于…；出较低的价钱

phrases.tran_cn: vt. 破产；沉没；屈服；失败
叠排式；（商品损耗量的）波动量；立式双筒短枪

trans.tran_cn: 在下面，在水下，少/小于，在昏迷中

trans.tran_en: below or at a lower level than something, or covered by something

trans.tran_cn: 在…下面，受…影响，由…控制，在…过程中，由…造成，根据，按照，少于，不足，用，以
trans.tran_en: less than a particular number, amount, age, or price
